rooms.description: Spacious living area with ambient lighting and open design, incorporating Vastu principles for positive energy flow.
Well-equipped kitchenette adjacent to the lounge for efficient service, designed in line with Indian culinary traditions.
Elegant dining space located near the kitchenette for ease of access during meals.
Functional washroom with tiled interiors and fixtures designed in accordance with local building norms.
Dedicated home theater space with acoustics optimized for entertainment; walls lined with soundproofing materials following local regulations.

openings.description: The main entrance is designed with a welcoming archway and is aligned eastwards in accordance with Vastu principles for prosperity.
Balcony door leading to an open space that allows natural ventilation and sunlight.
Service entrance for deliveries and utilities, ensuring convenience and adherence to safety norms.
